snippet.title: Caution Ahead - Part 1 - Teaser Clip
snippet.description:
You can hear me as the player character, John Rand, in this clip from Caution Ahead - Part 1

Coming May 1, 2024

Wishlist now on Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2809570/Caution_Ahead_Part_1/

Synopsis: This is the first installment of a three-part series featuring a run-and-hide type horror experience, with each part consisting of three chapters.

You follow the story of John Rand, an experienced search and rescue officer stationed at Richburg National Park. John is part of a broader search and rescue team tasked with finding the missing girl, Elena Peterson. Elena went missing while on a hiking trip with her parents. During the search and rescue operation, John finds himself isolated from the rest of the team and attempts to retrace his steps.
